name: get_random_joke
description: Fetches a random joke from the JokeAPI based on various filters.

category.description: Defines the joke category. Options include: 'Programming', 'Misc', 'Dark', 'Pun', 'Spooky', 'Christmas', or 'Any'. Defaults to 'Any'.

language.description: The language of the joke. Options include: 'cs', 'de', 'en', 'es', 'fr', 'pt'. Defaults to English ('en').

flags.description: A list of categories to exclude, such as 'nsfw', 'political', 'racist', 'sexist', 'religious', and 'explicit'. Defaults to None.

joke_type.description: Specifies the type of joke. Can be 'single' (one-liner) or 'twopart' (setup and punchline). Defaults to both.

search_string.description: Allows filtering the jokes based on a specific string. Defaults to None.

num_jokes.description: Specifies how many jokes to fetch. Defaults to 1.
